item.title: PowerShell for IT Professionals [#1] [#2] – Help
item.author: Author
item.description: About files solve issue If after running Update-Help you don’t have About topics, you might want to manually download them and extract the archive to the root of: C:\Windows\System32\WindowsPowerShell\v1.0\en PowerShell help – Exercises PowerShell is great in working with CSV files. Can you find help for any CSV related commands (you will need to use a wildcard) Can you tell what’s a difference between ConvertTo-CSV and Export-CSV commands
